attributes.action: Replace himself with Conservative MP Boris Johnson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition proposes that tousle-haired Conservative MP Boris Johnson be made Prime Minister forthwith. A Conservative PM under a Labour rule would require significant changes to Britian's political system, but this would be a small price to pay for the services of the great man.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
